name: Star Dodger Elite [LD39]
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 39: Running out of Power.

Avoid asteroids and grab batteries to stay alive as long as you can.

Hotkeys:

F9: Switch to Fullscreen/Windowed Mode

F10: Turn on/off sound

F12: Make a screenshot

Note: HTML version has some bugs, but it's playable. Anyway, I'd still recommend .exe or Installer.
